title: Riven or Fiora
body: So ive been playing for a few weeks now, and im wondering if i should get Fiora or Riven. Ive played fiora when she was free, and thought she was pretty good. Even got a quadrakill with her... wondering if Riven is better/worse... also, ive heard Riven got nerfed around a year ago... so.. yeah which should i get.. Thanks =)

replies.body: Fiora for sustained damage, riven for burst damage.
Riven is a goddess by her now and tear your foes asunder with your blade.
both are annoying asf lane bullies who pretty much zone you then kill you under tower with their 0/0 score
Fiora... shes OP and i always beat Rivens in lane with her !!! XD
depends, if you are bronze or silver Fiora, if you are getting to high gold learn Riven.

Riven has arguably a much higher level of depth and can be very powerful at a high skill level. Fiora I find is only powerful against the right match-ups, if she is against a mostly melee oriented champion. Fiora I find good, however she lacks the depth that Riven can present.

Both are good picks.
Riven is so much more strong and can carry way harder than FEEDORA. Riven has so much mobility and CC as well. - riven main
